title: Transfering desktop Thunderbird email a/c to Android Thunderbird app problem
creator: basswong
content: I followed the steps and when it comes to porting, an erroraf came up saying the "outgoing server not set". Tried twice, same error.Please help. Thanks.

title: Thunderbird Emails stuck in Outbox
creator: re777
content: My Android (Samsung S22) Thunderbird acct. sends some emails to Outbox where they become stuck and clicking "send messages" does nothing. Indiscriminate whether email has attachments or not. Sending it back to Drafts and resending ends up back in Outbox. Have tried all posted "fixes", short of uninstalling tbird and reinstalling. I am on home 5G wifi. WTH?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) SamsungBrowser/29.0 Chrome/136.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android
